distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nodejs4 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:
- CVE-2016-5180: c-ares: Fix for single-byte buffer overwrite (bsc#1007728).

Bug fixes:
- bsc#1009011: npm4 should provide versioned nodejs-npm and npm allowing nodejs-packaging to
  continue to function properly in Leap 42.2
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ares_create_query function in c-ares 1.x before 1.12.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a hostname with an escaped trailing dot.
notes.title: CVE description
